Although we do plan to enhance Content hub filtering in the future, we don't support folder filter (or custom filters) today.
If you really need more scalable and flexible content discovery and organization, taxonomies and smart folders might be your best option.
You can add multiple taxonomy fields to a content item and then use some for *internal-only* purposes (organization and discovery in the Content hub) and use others for *external* purposes like driving website search or related content links.
